1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 from .file_manager import FileManager
4 
5 from niryo_robot_utils.dataclasses.ABCSerializable import ABCSerializable
6 from niryo_robot_utils.dataclasses.Pose import Pose
7 from niryo_robot_utils.dataclasses.JointsPosition import JointsPosition
8 
9 
10 class PoseObj(ABCSerializable):
11 
12  def __init__(self, name: str, description: str, joints: JointsPosition, pose: Pose):
13  self.name = name
14  self.description = description
15  self.joints = joints
16  self.pose = pose
17 
18  def to_dict(self):
19  return {
20  'name': self.name,
21  'description': self.description,
22  'joints': self.joints.to_dict(),
23  'pose': self.pose.to_dict()
24  }
25 
26  @classmethod
27  def from_dict(cls, d):
28  if 'pose' not in d:
29  d['joints'] = {f'joint_{n}': joint for n, joint in enumerate(d['joints'])}
30  d['pose'] = {
31  'x': d['position'][0],
32  'y': d['position'][1],
33  'z': d['position'][2],
34  'roll': d['rpy'][0],
35  'pitch': d['rpy'][1],
36  'yaw': d['rpy'][2]
37  }
38  return cls(d['name'], d['description'], JointsPosition.from_dict(d['joints']), Pose.from_dict(d['pose']))
39 
40 
41 class PoseManager(FileManager):
42  """
43  Manages the creation, storage and loading of positions.
44 
45  :raises NiryoRobotFileException:
46  """
47  object_type = PoseObj
48 
49  def __init__(self, position_dir):
50  super(PoseManager, self).__init__(position_dir, "position")
51 
52  def create(self, pose_obj):
53  self._write(pose_obj.name, pose_obj)
